Wrapper function for add_group() to add sentence id

Source: R/utils_id.R
add_sentence_no.Rd

Wrapper function for add_group() to add sentence id

Usage

add_sentence_no(df, s_id = "sentence")

Arguments

df

A dataframe

s_id

A string for sentence colame

Value

A dataframe

Examples

review_mecab |>
  unescape_utf() |>
  add_sentence_no() |>
  print(n=200)
#> # A tibble: 19,985 × 15
